Disclaimer Disclaimer for FortuneWin Offline Casino 1. Age Restriction FortuneWin is committed to preventing underage gambling. Therefore, we require all our customers to be at least 21 years old to enter our casino and participate in any gaming activities. We reserve the right to request identification and proof of age at any time, and anyone found to be underage will be immediately refused service and may be subject to legal consequences. 2. Gaming Responsibility Gambling should be seen as a form of entertainment, and not a means to make a living or solve financial problems. We encourage our customers to gamble responsibly and to set limits on their expenditure. If you feel that you may have a gambling problem, please seek help from professional organizations such as Gamblers Anonymous. 3. Game Fairness At FortuneWin, we use only certified and regulated gaming equipment to ensure the fairness and integrity of our games. We adhere to strict guidelines and standards to ensure that all our games operate randomly and independently. Our games are regularly inspected and audited by independent third-party testing agencies. 4. Personal Information FortuneWin is committed to protecting the privacy and security of our customers' personal information. We only collect and use personal information for the purpose of providing our services and conducting our business. We do not share or sell personal information to third parties, except as required by law or to protect our legitimate interests. 5. Intellectual Property All the content on our website, including text, images, logos, and software, is owned by FortuneWin and protected by copyright and trademark laws. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of our content is strictly prohibited and may be subject to legal action. 6. Liability FortuneWin is not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or products. We assume no responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any information provided on our website. 7. Changes to Terms and Conditions FortuneWin reserves the right to change or update our terms and conditions at any time. It is the responsibility of our customers to review our terms and conditions regularly and to be aware of any changes. Continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms and conditions. 8. Governing Law FortuneWin is governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which it operates. Any disputes or claims arising from the use of our services or products shall be resolved in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations. 9. Customer Support FortuneWin is committed to providing excellent customer support and service. Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist with any questions, concerns, or issues that may arise. 10. Responsible Marketing FortuneWin does not condone or engage in any marketing practices that may be considered misleading, deceptive, or harmful to our customers. We strive to provide accurate and transparent information about our products and services, and to promote responsible gaming. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services. By using our services, you accept and consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. 2. Information We Collect We collect personal information from you when you use our services, including: Contact information, such as your name, address, email address, and phone number. Financial information, such as your credit card or bank account information. Demographic information, such as your age, gender, and interests. Usage information, such as your browsing history, search queries, and interaction with our website and services. 3. How We Use Your Information Provide and improve our services. Process transactions and send you invoices. Send you offers and promotions for our services. Respond to your inquiries and requests. Monitor and analyze usage and trends. Personalize your experience with our services. Detect and prevent fraudulent activity. 4. How We Share Your Information We may share your personal information with: Service providers who assist us in operating our services. Law enforcement or government agencies, as required by law. Business partners or affiliates, for the purpose of joint marketing efforts. Third-party vendors or affiliates, for the purpose of targeted advertising. 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking technologies to personalize your experience with our services and to analyze usage and trends. You can control the use of cookies in your browser settings, but please note that disabling cookies may limit your ability to use certain features of our services. 6. Security of Your Information We take reasonable measures to protect the security of your personal information, including encryption, firewalls, and secure servers. However, no security measures are 100% effective, and we cannot guarantee the security of your personal information. 7. pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing FortuneWin: Your Support Drives Us Forward. Thanks for Choosing FortuneWin We will contact you soon At FortuneWin, we're thrilled you've chosen to join our vibrant community of passionate casino enthusiasts. Our meticulously curated selection of games, ranging from classic slots to electrifying live dealer tables, caters to diverse tastes and preferences. We believe in fostering a sense of community and creating a space where players can connect and share their passion for the thrill of the game. We invite you to explore the exciting world of FortuneWin and discover why we're the go-to destination for offline casino entertainment.
